subject: The Skinny: Tuesday May 22, 2007
body:

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 





A 
      Web Site That Snitches On Snitches 
A Web site called whosarat.com, 
      which exposes the identities of government informants, is making the 
      government furious. 
And as Congress opens a heated 
      debate on immigration policy, the Washington Post has a 
      different kind of immigration story. 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...

Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
